price: 24. Que ne méditent-ils pas le Coran ? Auraient-ils leurs cœurs hermétiquement fermés (à la foi) ?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
